title: Making and Hearing Sounds

vocab.definition: Something you hear with your ears
A sound that is easy to hear because it's strong
A sound that is quiet and hard to hear
To move back and forth very quickly

teachingNotes: Use simple instruments and everyday objects. Explore loud vs. soft sounds. Demonstrate vibrations with rubber bands or drums.
